questions.question_text: Which three security design principles can help reduce overall security maintenance and troubleshooting, while still balancing security control? (Choose three.)

choices.C: Assigning a higher level role than necessary, then scaling back access permissions
choices.E: Assigning global read access to each cube, then fine-tuning none and write access within dimensional security
choices.A: Creating groups over assigning individual access permissions to users

discussion.content: ACD: The recommended best practice is to assign the lowest level role that fits additional privileges where necessary.
ACD would be correct answer. Users, Pls don't post incorrect answers and irrelevant links if you are not sure.

comments.content:
Sorry, A, B, D is correct.

Reference: https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/planning-budgeting-cloud/pfusa/EPM-INFORMATION-DEVELOPMENT-TEAM-E94139-6691CB58.pdf#_OPENTOPIC_TOC_PROCESSING_d127e18491

questions.question_text: Which three are benefits of using EPM Enterprise Cloud Service over EPM Standard Cloud Service? (Choose three.)

choices.E: deploy more than one supported business process in the same instance
choices.A: enable preseeded configurable content including dimensions, models, forms, rules, dashboards, infolets, and reports for Strategic Modeling
choices.B: with Free Form Planning, deploy Planning business processes with no dimension requirements and create business processes using Essbase outline files
choices.D: use of the Groovy scripting language to create or customize business rules
choices.C: Custom Planning, which allows a high degree of business process customization to support business requirements

discussion.content:
Correct Answer: B 
References: (Administering Planning Modules - Pushing Data to Integrate Business Processes)
https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/planning-budgeting-cloud/epbca/general_mapping_data_to_integrate_business_processes_104xf4672053.html

choices.D: Enable and configure Financials, and Workforce. Then to capture Workforce expenses for employees, enable Standard Rates from Workforce. For the Compensation Data for Reporting data map, synchronize then push the data.
choices.A: Enable and configure Financials, and Workforce. When enabling Workforce, create a custom Benefits dimension to map the data to. Then for the Financial Statement Integration data map, synchronize and push the data.
choices.C: Enable and configure Financials, and Workforce. When enabling Financials, create a custom Benefits dimension to map the data to. On the Financials Integration Summary form, run Calculate Compensation to update the Workforce data.
choices.B: Enable and configure Financials and Workforce. Then in the Workforce Benefits and Taxes wizard, select a financial account to map the benefit to. For Compensation Data, synchronize and run the data map.
